import React , {useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {firestore} from '../../firebase/config' import { FaFileSignature,FaSortAmountUpAlt,FaFeatherAlt,FaBarcode, FaImage } from 'react-icons/fa' const Books = () => { const [books,setBooks] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ const unsub = firestore.collection('Book').onSnapshot((snap)=>{ let books = []; snap.forEach(doc => { books.push({...doc.data()}); }); setBooks((oldBooks)=>{ return [...oldBooks,...books] }); return () => unsub(); }); },[]) return (

Add a book

{books.map((book)=>{ const {ISBN,Bookname,Author,Category,Price} = book; return })}
ISBN Bookname Author Category Price
{ISBN} {Bookname} {Author} {Category} {Price} $
) } export default Books
